title: Forwarding Agents - MediationZone Documentation 9.4 - InfoZone
text: A forwarding agent is responsible for distributing the data from the workflow to other systems or devices. An example of a forwarding agent could be one that creates a file from a data stream and transfers it to another system using FTP.
